name: Easy IP Redirection
author: Aman Verma

sections.description:
Easy IP Redirection plugin redirect visitors from Website URL to specific URL based on their country. This plugin is helpful if you want to redirect users from requested page/post/product or any other URL on your website to specific page/post/product or any other URL of same/other website based on their Country.

Easy IP Redirection plugin supports below databases:

  1. Freegeoip.net: This is FREE and provides 10,000 queries per hour

  2. Pingeolo.com: For more detailed database you can use this. It provides upto 80,000 queries per month depending on your plan.

Easy IP Redirection features include:

  • Adding 301 redirections.
  • Custom URL redirection.
  • Apache .htaccess is not required – works entirely inside WordPress
sections.installation:
The plugin is simple to install:

  1. Download easy-ip-redirection.zip
  2. Unzip and upload easy-ip-redirection directory to your /wp-content/plugins directory
  3. Go to the plugin menu page and activate the plugin
  4. Start adding redirections from the Easy IP Redirection menu page
sections.faq:
What is the performance of this plugin?

The plugin works in a similar manner to how WordPress handles permalinks and should not result in any noticeable slowdown to your site.

Do I need to download any database file for this plugin to work?

No database download required.

How to Use Freegeoip.net database with this plugin?

Select Enable FreeGEO Database option in Easy IP Redirection plugin settings. It is free you do not need to create any account for this.

How to Use Pingeolo database with this plugin?

  1. Go to http://www.pingeolo.com/ and create account (new user)
    1. Login and generate API key
    2. Select Enable Pingeolo Database option in Easy IP Redirection plugin settings and enter your API key there and save settings.
